mapper.update: update product_flow set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qualification_template_id = #{qualificationTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loan_template_id = #{loanTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_insurance = #{needInsurance,jdbcType=TINYINT}, insurance_template_id = #{insuranceTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capital_template_id = #{capitalTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pledge_template_id = #{pledgeTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_available = #{isAvailable,jdbcType=BIT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, product_id, qualification_template_id, loan_template_id, need_insurance, insurance_template_id, capital_template_id, pledge_template_id, is_available, created_by, created_on, is_delete from product_flow where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
